text: All India Tribes and Minorities Front is a political party in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh. The party works for the issues affecting the adivasi population. The party president was social activist Mangal Singh Negi, who died in 2017 aged 86.https://www.thestatesman.com/cities/social-activist- mangal-singh-negi-passes-away-1484232254.html AITMF advocates United Nations involvement as mediators in the Kashmir issue. The party also advocates a trifurcation of the state of Jammu and Kashmir in Kashmir, Jammu and Ladakh. ==References== Category:Political parties in Himachal Pradesh Category:Political parties in India
title: All India Tribes and Minorities Front
